Hotel Barcelona



...where we stayed, at the recommendation of Ferran Hurtado. Not fancy but quite pleasant, and they served a good breakfast buffet.
Taken Sunday, September 09, 2001, 06:17:08pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 1.0Mb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/160s @ F5.6, ISO 100, 43mm
